Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the power of the Human Rights Campaign compared to the NRA.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide enough evidence or data to support the statement that the Human Rights Campaign is more powerful than the NRA.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that power can be solely measured by lobbying efforts and political spending, which may not be the only factors determining power.
Exist alternative explanation: The evidence presented suggests that the NRA is actually more powerful than the Human Rights Campaign, indicating an alternative explanation to the claim.
